p: Strains of filoviruses ( n = 2), flaviviruses ( n = 9), alphaviruses ( n = 7), phleboviruses ( n = 2), and nairoviruses ( n = 1) were selected ( Table 3). All the viral strains included in the specificity panel were provided by European Virus Archive Goes Global (EVAg, Available online: https://www.european-virus-archive.com/), except Marburg and Crimean-Congo hemorrhagic fever virus RNA kindly provided by the BSL4 INSERM-Jean Merieux laboratory in thiocyanate guanidinium.
